attributes.action: Criminalise all acts of sexual intercourse between males.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Gay" love, sodomy, buggery. Whichever
term one chooses to describe the unnatural and disgusting practice of
penetrative sex between two males it remains a pervertion, and is contrary to all laws of common decency.  It should therefore be reintroduced as an illegal act.
